content.text: Welcome to LoyalBoards! This guide will help you get up and running quickly. To access your dashboard, simply log in using your email address.
Logging In
We use a passwordless 'Magic Link' system for security and ease of use. Enter your email on the login page, and we'll send you a direct link to sign in.
Once logged in, you'll see your main dashboard. This is your command center for managing boards, viewing analytics, and updating your profile.

content.alt: Dashboard Overview with Analytics and Create Form

articles.title: Your Profile & Settings
articles.description: Edit profile, change appearance, account settings

content.text: You can personalize your profile and the app's appearance to suit your preferences.
Editing Profile
Click on your avatar in the top right corner (or the menu on mobile) to access Profile Settings. Here you can update your Display Name and Profile Picture.
App Appearance
LoyalBoards supports multiple themes and Dark Mode. You can toggle these from the settings menu to customize your viewing experience.

articles.title: Creating & Managing Boards
articles.description: Create boards, custom urls, and public settings

content.text: Creating a New Board
On your dashboard, you'll find the 'Create Board' form. Enter a name for your board to get started properly. It will instantly appear in your list.
Board Settings
Click the 'Edit' button on any board to open advanced settings. Here you can configure:

items: Start by changing the Board Name and Description.
Custom URL (Slug): Choose a unique link for your board (e.g., /boards/feedback).
Appearance: Customize colors to match your brand.
Empty State: meaningful custom text shown when there are no posts.

articles.title: Public Feedback & Voting
articles.description: How users interact with your boards

content.text: Share your board's public URL with your users to collect feedback. Users can:

items: Post new feedback or feature requests.
Upvote existing posts to show support.
Comment on posts to add context.

content.text: You can filter posts by 'Newest', 'Top Voted', or search for specific keywords.

articles.title: Analytics & Notifications
articles.description: Track views, votes, and recent activity

content.text: Stay on top of your community with the Analytics Dashboard. We track Views, Posts, and Votes to give you insights into user engagement.
Notifications
The dashboard also displays a list of recent activities, such as new votes or comments, so you never miss an update.
You can manage your subscription directly from the app. Click the 'Billing' button to access the customer portal.
In the portal, you can update your payment method, download invoices, or switch between Monthly and Lifetime plans.
